lines.gurmukhi: Prkq locn ADr pujw qwpY qn mn mY Aausyr kb lwl giH AwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Dharakat Lochan Adhar Pujaa Taapai Tana , Man Mai Aousayr Kab Laal Grih Aavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: With earnest desire of meeting my beloved Lord in my heart, my eyes, lips and arms are quivering. My body temperature is rising while my mind is restless. When will my dear beloved come to abide into my house-like heart?

lines.gurmukhi: nYnn sY nYn Ar bYnn sy bYn imlY rYn smY cYn ko ishjwsn bulwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Nainan Sai Nain Ar Bainan Say Bain Milai , Rain Samai Chain Ko Sihajaasan Bulaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will I have my eyes and words (lips) meeting with the eyes and words (lips) of my Lord? And when will my beloved Lord call me to His bed at night to make me enjoy the divine pleasure of this meeting?

lines.gurmukhi: kr gih kr aur aur sY lgwie pun AMk AMkmwl kir sihj smwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kar Gahi Kar Ur Ur Sai Lagaai Pouna , Ank Ankamaal Kari Sahij Samaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will He hold me by my hand, take me into His embrace, in His lap, around His neck and plunge me into the spiritual ecstasy?

lines.gurmukhi: pRym rs AMmiRq pIAwie qiRpqwie AwlI dXw kY dXwl dyv kwmnw pujwvhI ]665]
lines.transliteration_english: Praym Ras Anmrit Peeaai Tripataai Aalee , Dayaa Kai Dayaal Dayv Kaamanaa Pujaavahee ?665?

Shabad OS B.translation: O my co-congregational friends! When will the beloved Lord make me drink the loving elixir of spiritual union and satiate me; and when will the effulgent and kind Lord become benevolent and appease the desire of my mind?  (665)
